definition:
During a recording session in a Setup Datasets are
      obtained from Cells and/or a Subject by using various stimuli (Stimulus section).

end.definition: The date and time at which the recording ended in  (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format).

end_date.definition:
The date the recording session ended (YYYY-MM-DD
         format).

end_time.definition: The time the recordings ended (hh:mm:ss format).

experimenter.definition: The name of the person actually performing the recordings.

experimenter_id.definition: If registered in a database the primary key of the person that performed the experiments.

start.definition: The date and time at which the recording started in  (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss format).

start_date.definition: The date the recording session was conducted (YYYY-MM-DD format).

start_time.definition: The time the recordings began (hh:mm:ss format).
